#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    unsigned int a,b,sum,carry;
    cin>>a>>b;
    while(a!=0&&b!=0){
        int cnt=0;
        carry=0;
        while(a>0||b>0){
            int c=a%10;
            int d=b%10;
            int e=carry+c+d;
            if(e>=10){
                cnt++;
                carry=e/10;
            }
            else{
                carry=0;
            }
            a=a/10;
            b=b/10;
        }
        if(cnt==0)
        cout<<"No carry operation."<<endl;
        else if(cnt==1)
        cout<<"1 carry operation."<<endl;
        else
        cout<<cnt<<" carry operations."<<endl;
        cin>>a>>b;
    }
}
